# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-102">Nasıl yapılır: Otomatik Oluşturulan Sütunları Windows Forms DataGridView Denetiminden Kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-103">Olduğunda, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> denetim sütunlarını veri kaynağından verileri temel alan için otomatik olarak ayarlandığında, seçmeli olarak bazı sütunlar atlayabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-104">Bunu çağırarak yapmak <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> yöntemi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> koleksiyonu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-105">Ayarlayarak görünümünde sütunları alternatif olarak, gizleyebilirsiniz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> özelliğine `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-106">Belirli koşullar gizli sütunları görüntülemek istediğinizde ya da görüntülemeden sütunları verilere erişim gerektiğinde bu teknik yararlıdır.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-107">Otomatik oluşturulan sütunları kaldırmak için</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-108">Çağrı <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> yöntemi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> koleksiyonu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](../../../../samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](../../../../samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-109">Otomatik oluşturulan sütunları gizleme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-110">Sütunun ayarlamak <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> özelliğine `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](../../../../samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](../../../../samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-112">Kod Derleniyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-113">Bu örnek gerektirir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> adlı Denetim `dataGridView1` içeren bir tabloya bağlı `Fax` ve `CustomerID` sütunlar gibi `Customers` Northwind örnek veritabanı tablosunda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="0b9d9-115">Başvurular <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> ve <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> derlemeler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0b9d9-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
